content: उपनी {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To bring near, fetch; उपनयति मुनिकुमारकेभ्यः फलानि <ls>K. 45</ls>, <ls n="K.">62</ls>; विधिनैवोपनीतस्त्वं <ls>Mk. 7. 6</ls>; अन्नं <ls>Ms. 3. 225</ls>; <ls>M. 2. 5</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 122</ls>; तेन ह्युपनय शरं <ls>V. 5</ls>; <ls>R. 10. 52</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 72.</ls> {@--2@} ({%a%}) To offer, present to; हरये स्वदेहमुपानयत् <ls>R. 2. 59</ls>; <ls>Bk. 6. 70</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 65</ls>; आर्यस्यासनमुपनय <ls>Mk. 9</ls>; <ls>M. 3.</ls> ({%b%}) To hand over, give over; अंतःपुरपरिचारिकामध्यमुपनीता <ls>K. 101</ls>; <ls>Māl. 1</ls>; <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; <ls>U. 2</ls>; अचिरोपनीता वः शिष्या <ls>M. 1</ls> recently made over (for instruction). {@--3@} To bring to, subject, expose or put to; आत्मा क्लेशस्य पदमुपनीतः <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 13. 39</ls>; <ls>K. 173.</ls> {@--4@} To bring about, cause, produce, accomplish; उपनयन्नर्थान् <ls>Pt. 3. 180</ls>; उपनयन्नंगैरनंगोत्सवं <ls>Gīt. 1</ls>; <ls>K. 171.</ls> {@--5@} To bring information, communicate. {@--6@} To bring into any state, lead or reduce to; अयोऽभेद्यमुपायेन द्रवतामुपनीयते <ls>Kām. 11. 47.</ls> {@--7@} To take into one's possession, lead away, lead; <ls>K. 169.</ls> {@--8@} To bring near to oneself, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} invest with the sacred thread (<ab>Atm.</ab> <ls>P. I. 3. 36</ls>); क्षात्रेण कल्पेनोपनीय <ls>U. 2</ls>; माणवकमुपनयते <ls>Sk.</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 29</ls>; <ls>Bk. 1. 15</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 49</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 2.">69</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 2.">140.</ls> {@--9@} To hire, employ as hired servants; कर्मकरानुपनयते <ls>Sk.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To cause (a master) to receive (a pupil), cause to invest with the sacred thread.
